item.title: How to use @Attribute decorator in Angular
item.description: The @Attribute decorator allows passing data from a parent to a child component in a way very similar to the @Input decorator. But @Attribute is very limited in comparison to @Input as it only allows passing simple static string data. How to use First, you must decorate a constructor parameter.
